title: Skull Monster 01 - Game Assets + Extra
description: A unique Skull Monster creature with spear weapon for your game, designed to be versatile for the Modern, Futuristic or Medieval Horror/Action game!
longDescription:
A unique Skull Monster creature with spear weapon for your game, designed to be versatile for the Modern, Futuristic or Medieval Horror/Action game!


Have you already purchased at least one Stigma Studios product on UE MarketPlace? Join on Discord and access to a Limited Promo - You can choose one Product for FREE
This is a limited promotion, if you have ever purchased even a single Stigma Studios product in the UE Marketplace, that will allow you to have one character of your choice for FREE! Once you have entered the Discord, check the #welcome channel and follow the instructions! This promo is not cumulative, is valid only once.

This type of assets aims to offer a convenient character and does not reflect the quality of "premium" assets. Updates are planned for this assets in the future and may increase in price!

Thanks for the support!


Epic Games Animation is used for display/example only.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Full 3D Character: 3d model to get a unique design impact for your game.
  • Extra: Spear weapon!
  •  Versatile Design: Model designed to be used in different artistic contexts and be versatile.

Rigged: Yes

Vertex counts of Main Character: 32.083

Tris counts of Main Character: 57.495


Texture Resolutions: 4096x4096

Number of Animations: 8 (ONLY Epic Games Default Third Person Animation for Demonstration purpose retarget to SM01_Full)
